messages.messageBody:
Thanks, I liked that. It truly says it all in a way few people ever
consider.

John Andersen


----- Original Message -----
From: <WhizMrs@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 1:11 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Learning


> From: WhizMrs@...
>
> My fav saying <poem or whatever you want to call it> is as goes...AHEM:
> A squirrel learns to climb by climbing,
> A bird learns to fly by flying,
> A monkey learns to swing through the trees by swinging,
> In all of the animal world each species learns from their mommies and
> daddies,
> and in packs<Aunts, Uncles, Cousins, etc.>
> But yet some Humans think if we are left to our own devices, our children
> will fail to learn, we are not capable.
> Have any of you ever seen a school to teach a bird how to FLY????
>
>
> Sorry....just had to vent : )
> If anyone has that poem or saying can you send it to me PLEASE????
>
> > Check it out!

messages.subject: Re: Learning
messages.msgSnippet: My fav saying  is as goes...AHEM: A squirrel learns to climb by climbing, A bird learns to fly by flying, A monkey learns
messages.messageBody:
My fav saying <poem or whatever you want to call it> is as goes...AHEM:
A squirrel learns to climb by climbing,
A bird learns to fly by flying,
A monkey learns to swing through the trees by swinging,
In all of the animal world each species learns from their mommies and
daddies,
and in packs<Aunts, Uncles, Cousins, etc.>
But yet some Humans think if we are left to our own devices, our children
will fail to learn, we are not capable.
Have any of you ever seen a school to teach a bird how to FLY????


Sorry....just had to vent : )
If anyone has that poem or saying can you send it to me PLEASE????
